document_name_accent: suy gian tinh mach chi duoi.json
document_title: Varicose veins of the lower limbs: Causes, signs, treatment
subsection_name: suy-gian-tinh-mach-chi-duoi.json_3_Progressive stage of lower limb varicose veins
subsection_content:
The system is applied to divide according to CAEP, in which the stage of disease progression and clinical severity are divided into C1-C6 as follows:
C1: Spider or reticular varicose veins; C2: Large varicose veins under the skin >3mm; C3: Edema; C4: Changes in skin structure and subcutaneous tissue (eczema); C5: Ulcers can heal; C6: Ulcer does not heal
Typical images of the progression of lower limb varicose veins
